entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:02 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 5:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising

Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain or ice pellets overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
